tool_description: This API offers an efficient means to download videos from Pinterest. Users simply need to provide the Pinterest video URL, and in return, they receive a direct download link for the video.
name: Pinterest Video Downloader API
title: Pinterest Video Downloader API

api_list.name: Pinterest Video Downloader API
api_list.description: This API offers an efficient means to download videos from Pinterest. Users simply need to provide the Pinterest video URL, and in return, they receive a direct download link for the video.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pinterest-video-downloader-api.p.rapidapi.com/pinterest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pinterest-video-downloader-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pinterest-video-downloader-api.p.rapidapi.com/pinterest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pinterest-video-downloader-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
